content: Brilliantly observant and funny. Working in tech for 20 years, I’m oblivious to how odd it must seem to others. The laptop incident made me angry. Everybody takes notes on laptops. In client meetings or not. What are you meant to do? Sit there and smile for the entire time being unproductive? Sounded like Jen was making a power play on the new kid. You handled the situation with grace.
